room_title: Escape room "Mr. Connolly's Office" by Stillwater Escape Co. in Minneapolis - St. Paul
room_description: Mr. Connollyâ€™s Office Room is based on the historic Connolly Shoe Factory of old, and it's owner, Mr. Connolly. With some real historical documents and a fun fiction based story, you and your fellow agents working on an as yet unsolved crime and escaping before the guards return. You have an hour to complete your mission so work fast and use team work to get out unscathed!
